GREENVILLE N.C. Music games food and fireworks will be included among festivities planned for ECUs Second Annual Great Spring Tailgate sponsored by US Cellular on Saturday April  PERIOD

The festival scheduled in conjunction with the ECU versus South Florida baseball game will begin at  p.m PERIOD in the Harrington Field area of the ECU campus PERIOD Advance reservations are required PERIOD

The afternoon of fun will include barbecue plates from Abrams Barbecue of Tarboro games and events for children and a special birthday party for Pee Dee the Pirate complete with cake and goody bags for kids PERIOD

Steve Hardys Original Beach Party will provide entertainment with the Delta Riders Band beginning at  p.m PERIOD

The first pitch of the ECUSouth Florida baseball game which will be televised locally by WITNTV is slated for  p.m PERIOD A fireworks show will follow the game PERIOD

Tickets for the event are  per person which includes a barbecue dinner and a ticket to the baseball game PERIOD Meal tickets alone are priced at  PERIOD

Fans may purchase tickets by calling  PERIOD The deadline for ordering is Wednesday April  PERIOD
